name: Splat! (itch) (GentWorm)
description:
This is a simple 2D platformer game with one big level to beat, try to get all the coins too.

This is my very first completely 2D game,  and the first game that I have made in a very long time. Splat might have some bugs which you can report and I will try to fix immediately. 

From now on, this game will only receive bug-fix updates, no more content will be added. This is just a game to get myself back into game development, I have many more projects planned too! Splat was made in exactly 12 days.

Lastly, I have made all of my code open-source on GitHub! If you would like to see or use the code to learn how to make your own games, you are free to do so.  If you have any suggestions on how to make my code better, then feel  free to let me know.
